text: Red Dragon is a 2002 crime thriller movie based on the book of the same name. It was directed by Brett Ratner with Anthony Hopkins returning for the role of Hannibal Lecter and Edward Norton as Dr. Will Graham. ==Cast== *Anthony Hopkins as Hannibal Lecter *Edward Norton as Dr. Will Graham *Ralph Fiennes as Francis Dolarhyde / The Tooth Fairy *Harvey Keitel as Jack Crawford *Emily Watson as Reba McClane == Other websites == * * * Category:2000s horror thriller movies Category:2000s crime thriller movies Category:2000s psychological movies Category:2002 horror movies Category:2002 crime movies Category:2000s English-language movies Category:American horror thriller movies Category:American crime thriller movies Category:German crime movies Category:German thriller movies Category:German horror movies Category:Hannibal Lecter movies Category:Movies directed by Brett Ratner Category:Movies about cannibalism Category:Movies about abduction Category:Movies set in the 1980s Category:Universal Pictures movies Category:Movies set in Baltimore Category:Movies set in Missouri
title: Red Dragon (movie)
